import{createApi,fetchBaseQuery}from'@reduxjs/toolkit/query/react';// create the api
export var appApi=createApi({reducerPath:'appApi',baseQuery:fetchBaseQuery({baseUrl:'http://localhost:8080'}),endpoints:function endpoints(builder){return{signup:builder.mutation({query:function query(user){return{url:'/users/signup',method:'POST',body:user};}}),login:builder.mutation({query:function query(user){return{url:'/users/login',method:'POST',body:user};}}),// creating product
createProduct:builder.mutation({query:function query(product){return{url:'/products',body:product,method:"POST"};}}),deleteProduct:builder.mutation({query:function query(_ref){var product_id=_ref.product_id,user_id=_ref.user_id;return{url:"/products/".concat(product_id),body:{user_id:user_id},method:"DELETE"};}}),updateProduct:builder.mutation({query:function query(product){return{url:"/products/".concat(product.id),body:product,method:"PATCH"};}}),// add to Cart
addToCart:builder.mutation({query:function query(cartInfo){return{url:"/products/add-to-cart",body:cartInfo,method:"POST"};}}),// remove from Cart
removeFromCart:builder.mutation({query:function query(cartInfo){return{url:"/products/remove-from-cart",body:cartInfo,method:"POST"};}}),// increase Cart product
increaseCartProduct:builder.mutation({query:function query(body){return{url:"/products/increase-cart",body:body,method:"POST"};}}),// decrease Cart product
decreaseCartProduct:builder.mutation({query:function query(body){return{url:"/products/decrease-cart",body:body,method:"POST"};}}),createOrder:builder.mutation({query:function query(body){return{url:'/orders',body:body,method:"POST"};}})};}});var useSignupMutation=appApi.useSignupMutation,useLoginMutation=appApi.useLoginMutation,useCreateProductMutation=appApi.useCreateProductMutation,useAddToCartMutation=appApi.useAddToCartMutation,useDecreaseCartProductMutation=appApi.useDecreaseCartProductMutation,useIncreaseCartProductMutation=appApi.useIncreaseCartProductMutation,useRemoveFromCartMutation=appApi.useRemoveFromCartMutation,useCreateOrderMutation=appApi.useCreateOrderMutation,useDeleteProductMutation=appApi.useDeleteProductMutation,useUpdateProductMutation=appApi.useUpdateProductMutation;export{useSignupMutation,useLoginMutation,useCreateProductMutation,useAddToCartMutation,useDecreaseCartProductMutation,useIncreaseCartProductMutation,useRemoveFromCartMutation,useCreateOrderMutation,useDeleteProductMutation,useUpdateProductMutation};export default appApi;
